sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import ShiftHeader from "./ShiftHeader"; import MissionList from "./MissionList"; import Card from "../UI/Card"; import Button from "../UI/Button"; import Input from "../UI/Input"; const ShiftSummary = (props) => { const [shiftDate, setShiftDate] = useState("") const [dispatcher, setDispatcher] = useState("") const shiftDateChangeHandler = (event) => { console.log(event.target.value) setShiftDate(event.target.value) } const dispatcherChangeHandler = (event) => { console.log(event.target.value) setDispatcher(event.target.value) } return (

Shift summary

{props.missionList.length > 0 && ( <>
    {props.missionList.map((mission, index) => (

  • Type : {mission.missionType.name}

    Qty : {mission.quantity}

    VINs : {mission.vins}

    Pick-up address : {mission.pickUp}

    Drop-off address : {mission.dropOff}

    Fleet : {mission.fleet}

    Comment : {mission.comment}

    Delete
    • ))}
)}
); }; export default ShiftSummary;
